title: Everything you ever wanted to know about the Georgians, but were afraid to ask
itunes:title: Everything you ever wanted to know about the Georgians, but were afraid to ask
itunes:subtitle: Kate Smith responds to listener queries and popular search enquiries about British society during the 18th and early 19th centuries. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
In the latest of our series tackling the big questions on major historical topics, historian Kate Smith responds to listener queries and popular search enquiries about British society during the 18th and early 19th centuries. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
